verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:12
verses.text: Now David was the son of that Ephrathite of Beth–lehem–judah, whose name was Jesse; and he had eight sons: and the man went among men for an old man in the days of Saul.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:13
verses.text: And the three eldest sons of Jesse went and followed Saul to the battle: and the names of his three sons that went to the battle were Eliab the firstborn, and next unto him Abinadab, and the third Shammah.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:14
verses.text: And David was the youngest: and the three eldest followed Saul.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:15
verses.text: But David went and returned from Saul to feed his father’s sheep at Beth–lehem.
